Package com.jme3.scene

Interface Summary
CollisionData CollisionData is an interface that can be used to do triangle-accurate collision between bounding volumes and rays.
SceneGraphVisitor Interface to traverse and visit scene graph by calling Spatial.depthFirstTraversal() or Spatial.breadthFirstTraversal().
 

Class Summary
AssetLinkNode The AssetLinkNode does not store its children when exported to file.
CameraNode This Node is a shorthand for using a CameraControl.
Geometry  
LightNode This Node is a shorthand for using a CameraControl.
Mesh  
Node Node defines an internal node of a scene graph.
SceneGraphVisitorAdapter Traverse and visit Geometry/Node by calling Spatial.depthFirstTraversal() or Spatial.breadthFirstTraversal().
Spatial Spatial defines the base class for scene graph nodes.
UserData  
VertexBuffer A VertexBuffer contains a particular type of geometry data used by Meshes.
 

Enum Summary
Mesh.Mode  
Spatial.CullHint  
VertexBuffer.Format  
VertexBuffer.Type Type of buffer.
VertexBuffer.Usage The usage of the VertexBuffer, specifies how often the buffer is used.
